\newcommand{\ottt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{t}  ,\ \ottnt{c}  ,\ \ottnt{s}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{triv} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{box} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{unbox} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{error} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} ) .  \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{0}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{[]}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{t}  ::  \ottnt{t'} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{squash} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{split} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottn}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{n}  ,\ \ottnt{m}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{0}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{n}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottv}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{v}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{triv} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{[]}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{squash}_{ \ottnt{S} } }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{split}_{ \ottnt{S} } }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{box}_{ \ottnt{A} } }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottnt{A} } }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} ) .  \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{n}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}  ,\ \ottnt{D}  ,\ \ottnt{E}  ,\ \ottnt{S}  ,\ \ottnt{U}  ,\ \ottnt{K}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{X}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \top }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{ \mathbb{S} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\mbox{?}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleKXXarrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{K\_arrow}}

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}  : \star }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleKXXprodName}[0]{\ottdrulename{K\_prod}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleKXXprod}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{A}  \times  \ottnt{B}   : \star }{%

 \Gamma  \vdash   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B}   : \star }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXReflName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Refl}}

 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXReflName}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_U}}

\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  : \star }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \top  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXVarName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Var}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma   \quad   \Gamma \,\text{Ok}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXVarName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXListName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_List}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXList}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{B}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXListName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXProdName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Prod}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXProd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXProdName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXArrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Arrow}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXArrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXArrowName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXForallName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Forall}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXForall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma , \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A}   \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXForallName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsubtype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXRefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXU{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXVar{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXProd{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXArrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXForall{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%

}}

 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{squash}   :  \ottnt{K}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%

}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_succ}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXsuccName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXncaseName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_ncase}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXncase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Nat}   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXncaseName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXemptyName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_empty}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma \,\text{Ok}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  : \star  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{[]}  :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} ).   \mathsf{List}\, \ottmv{X}   }{%
{\ottdruleTXXemptyName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXconsName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_cons}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXconsName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlcaseName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_lcase}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlcase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}  }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXlcaseName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXpairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXpairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXfstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXsndName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} ) .  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXlamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXappName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_app}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXappName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXLamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_Lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma , \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A}   \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t}   :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXLamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtypeAppName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_typeApp}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtypeApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B} ).  \ottnt{C}    \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXtypeAppName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXSubName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_Sub}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXSub}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXSubName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXerrorName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_error}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXerror}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{error}   :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXerrorName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXvarP{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXBox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXUnbox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXsquash{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXsplit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXunitP{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXzeroP{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXsucc{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXncase{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXempty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXcons{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXlcase{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXpair{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXfst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXsnd{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXlam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXLam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXtypeApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXSub{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXerror{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsTyping}{
\ottdefnkind{}\ottdefnctxOk{}\ottdefnsubtype{}\ottdefntype{}}

% defns Reduction
%% defn red
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretracTName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_retracT}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretracT}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottnt{A} }  \, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{box}_{ \ottnt{A} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXretracTName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretracTEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_retracTE}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretracTE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{A}  \neq  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottnt{A} }  \, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{box}_{ \ottnt{B} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{error} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXretracTEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretractUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_retractU}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretractU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{split}_{ \ottnt{U} }  \, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{squash}_{ \ottnt{U} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXretractUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretractUEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_retractUE}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXretractUE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{U_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \neq  \ottnt{U_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \mathsf{split}_{ \ottnt{U_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }  \, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{squash}_{ \ottnt{U_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }  \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{error} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXretractUEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXsuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_succ}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXsucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}}%
}{
\mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t'}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXsuccName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseZeroName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_ncase0}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseZero}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottsym{0} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXncaseZeroName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseSuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_ncaseSucc}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseSucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXncaseSuccName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_ncase1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}}%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t'} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXncaseOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_ncase2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXncaseTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseThreeName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_ncase3}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXncaseThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXncaseThreeName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseEmptyName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_lcaseEmpty}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseEmpty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottsym{[]} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseEmptyName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseConsName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_lcaseCons}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseCons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseConsName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXheadName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_head}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXhead}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
 \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXheadName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXtailName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_tail}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXtail}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
 \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXtailName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_lcase1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}}%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t'} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_lcase2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseThreeName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_lcase3}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseThreeName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXbetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_beta}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(}   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ) .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXbetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_eta}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{x}  \not\in \mathsf{FV}( \ottnt{t} ) }%
}{
 \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ) .   \ottnt{t} \, \ottmv{x}    \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXprojOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_proj1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXprojOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\mathsf{fst} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXprojOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXprojTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_proj2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXprojTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\mathsf{snd} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXprojTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXetaPName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_etaP}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXetaP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{,}  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXetaPName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXappOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_app1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXappOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXappOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXappTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_app2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXappTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXappTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}}%
}{
\mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t'}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXfstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}}%
}{
\mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t'}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXsndName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXpairOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_pair1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXpairOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXpairOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXpairTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_pair2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXpairTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXpairTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXtypeBetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_typeBeta}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXtypeBeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottsym{(}   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B} ) . \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{)}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulerdXXtypeBetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXtypeAppName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rd\_typeApp}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdXXtypeApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
 [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \rightsquigarrow   [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdXXtypeAppName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{\ottcom{call by name}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXretracT{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXretracTE{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXlcaseCons{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXhead{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXtail{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdXXetaP{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsReduction}{

\ottdefnsReduction
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}

\begin{document}
\ottall

\begin{verbatim}
Definition rules:        69 good    0 bad
Definition rule clauses: 124 good    0 bad
\end{verbatim}
